title: Ashaiyinaip-pAraDi ettanai kOTi
sahitya:
Ashaiyinaip-pAraDi ettanai kOTi kOTi bhaktargaLAlum attanaiyum pOdAdenru metta metta vEnumenra


anupallavi

  Ashaikkum edarkkm aLavuNDu ivaLO attanaiyum mIruvAn ettaik-kaNDu 
nEshamuDan ninrADum toNDargaLaik-kaNDu nIyum nAnum onronru ADip-pADikkoNDa


caraNam 1    appanai madikkAdAn Ororuvan avan pErO prahlAdanenum kalmattan 
appanai madikkAdAn vEroruvan avan pErO sukhan ennum kiLip-piLLai
    caraNam 2    aNNanai veruttAnE innavanai nambi avan pErO vibhISaNan rAvaNan tambi 
aNNanai veruttAnE innavanai nambi avan pErO sugrIvan vAliyin tambi
